short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A.R.P. Syndicate's Subdomain Center Browser Extension downloads a list of subdomains for the website you're on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Subdomain Center, A product by A.R.P. Syndicate, scours the web, gathering and interpreting data from from all over the Internet. Consequently, it has evolved into The World's Fastest Growing Subdomain & Shadow IT Intelligence Database and is freely accessible to all.
